txt.en:
'I am here to help you become a more powerful Hunter. As you gain levels, more skills will be available for you.

'Use the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> against a Training Dummy.'

HINT: Hunters need <rgb=#ffff00>Focus</rgb> to use some of their special shots, and <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> is such a skill. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Quick Shot</rgb> ability until you have <rgb=#ffff00>three Focus</rgb> points, then use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Hunter someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'

'Use your skill to strike the Training Dummy.'

HINT:

Hunters need <rgb=#ffff00>Focus</rgb> to use some of their special shots, and <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> is such a skill. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Quick Shot</rgb> ability until you have <rgb=#ffff00>three Focus</rgb> points, then use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>.
As you gain levels, you should gain new skills to help you develop into a more powerful Hunter.
You have struck the Training Dummy with Penetrating Shot
Use Penetrating Shot against a Training Dummy

Use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> on the training-dummy nearby. 

HINT:

Hunters need <rgb=#ffff00>Focus</rgb> to use some of their special shots, and <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> is such a skill. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Quick Shot</rgb> ability until you have <rgb=#ffff00>three Focus</rgb> points, then use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>.
Talk to the Hunter Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
The Hunter Trainer is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your skill, you should return to your trainer and tell her of your success.
